## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                          | Type                                                                                                                            | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `blurContent` | `blur-content` | Blur Content: show loading spinner over content slot | `boolean`                                                                                                                       | `undefined` |
| `class`       | `class`        | CSS Class                                            | `string`                                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
| `color`       | `color`        | Color                                                | `"black" \| "danger" \| "dark" \| "info" \| "light" \| "link" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "white"` | `'info'`    |
| `fullscreen`  | `fullscreen`   | Fullscreen                                           | `boolean`                                                                                                                       | `undefined` |
| `show`        | `show`         | Show                                                 | `boolean`                                                                                                                       | `true`      |
| `size`        | `size`         | Size                                                 | `"large" \| "medium" \| "normal" \| "small"`                                                                                    | `'normal'`  |
